name: Night of the Red Cubes: Crimson Tide
name_original: Night of the Red Cubes: Crimson Tide
description:
Will you sink or swim in the Crimson Tide?

Night of the Red Cubes: Crimson Tide is an action-packed twin-stick shooter with guns, rockets, bloodthirsty monsters, and torrents of red cube matter! Your name is Blue Cubington, and you are caught in an enclosed area after a car crash on a dark night.  You immediately pick up a pistol in the distance, before being attacked by a swarm of the awful Red Cubes...how long will you survive their assault?

  • 4 distinct weapons - devastate the Red Cube hordes with weapons that cut swaths through their ranks, chew through them, or blow them to smithereens! 
  • 4 distinct enemy types - beware the different types of Red Cubes; the collectively dangerous Creepers, the grotesque Carriers, the speedy Runners, and the territorial Broodmothers!
  • Multiple game modes for maximum challenge - Unlock specific parameters to unlock new game modes, where you battle groups of different enemies and start with different weapons!

What are you waiting for?  Show those red beasts who the real monster is!
